summary: Award-winning sales executive with international sales experience.

experience.title: Business Development Associate
experience.description: Prospected and developed relationships for unqualified and qualified sales leads using Market Master, Salesforce, cold calls, and networking. Generated 60-70 sales calls per day and distributed sales materials to future clients. Secured appointments for District Managers and built relationships to secure new leads and appointments with proper contacts before or after qualification to support the sale.

experience.title: Managing Director
experience.description: Marketing and Management Company for telemarketing firms and the hospitality/hotel industry. Managed projects for Accelerated Financial Center, LLC, M.R. Carter, LLC, The Ramada Inn (Stuart, FL), and the Tourist Information Center of Martin County. Responsible for telemarketing functions and sales, relationship building, and administration for two million-dollar companies handling consumer credit card interest rate reductions under the Federal Credit Card Act. Oversaw guest services, group sales, conference services, catering, and restaurant management with an annual budget of about $4 million. Initiated a cold-calling program and used CRS with the Ramada to prospect clients, promote sales, and develop client relationships.

experience.title: General Manager
experience.description: Developed and operated a small thirty-room upscale resort. Responsible for guest services, rooms, operations, accounting, and sales/marketing. Built a robust sales prospecting program for new clients and prospects through PR and consumer awareness. First-year revenue: $400,000.

experience.title: Director of Sales
experience.description: Responsible for all sales and marketing staff and activities for the resort, including public relations, client base relationship, awareness building, and staff training to support sales promotions. Annual revenue exceeded $10 million.

experience.title: Director of Travel Industry Sales
experience.description: Indian River Plantation Resort & Yacht Harbor. Managed positions including Manager on Duty, Group Sales Manager, and Director of Travel Industry Sales (Domestic and International). Led as leading Group Sales Manager for four years; appointed in 1995 as Director to develop international and domestic leisure markets, increasing leisure market room revenue by $2 million in 18 months.

experience.title: Senior Group Sales Manager
experience.description: Trained in all departments: Management Trainee, Director of Conference Services & Catering, Group Sales Manager and Resort Manager on Duty. Responsible for groups and group bookings across Midwest, Northeast, and Florida markets. Implemented a sales process that improved the bottom line. Annual revenues exceeded $60 million. Led as Leading Group Sales Manager, exceeding goal production for 5 years.

experience.title: Assistant Manager
experience.description: Concentration on group, front and back-of-house for the Food & Beverage Division. Primary employment during college.
